creator: MemeXDreams
title: How to Make a Cheap Vocaloid Concert
materials_required: Sheet of single tempered glass bigger than the screen
description: This project demonstrates how to create a low-budget Vocaloid concert experience at home using a device, YouTube, and a sheet of glass. It involves reflecting a 'hologram ready' Vocaloid video from YouTube onto the glass to create a holographic effect.
steps: Access YouTube on a device and search for 'Vocaloid hologram ready' videos.
Select a video, fullscreen it, and turn off subtitles. Wait for the Vocaloid to appear then pause the video.
Position the sheet of glass to reflect the screen, ensuring it reflects the entire Vocaloid.
Play the video and observe the reflection on the glass. Adjust screen brightness or ambient lighting if the hologram is too faint.
